line: well y’know i was thinking of moving the couch over here
why would you want to do that
so that there will be a decent place for me to sit
rach there is a decent place to
and your lap does not count
come on help me move this
as in rosita does not move
the big deal is that it is the exact equal distance from the bathroom to the kitchen and it’s at the perfect angle so you don’t get any glare coming of off stevie
come on rosita us chichas got to stick together
after you guys get married when you introduce me to people you’re gonna have to say this is my brother in law ross
not my friend ross brother in law ross
couldn’t i just say this is ross
so i was checking out the uh real estate section
oh it looks like mom and dad’s house
oh it even has a tree with a broken limb out front and the uh the window in the attic is oh my god
what happened to the window in the attic
i can’t believe mom and dad are selling the house
i can’t believe they they didn’t even tell us
i can’t believe i still don’t know what happened to the window in the attic
monica and i just saw the house in the paper
who did you leave a message with
joey joey i am so sorry
i told you not to move it
rach how would you feel if say i wanted to move you mom and you said don’t and i did it anyway and her head fell off
okay come on joey i’ll buy you a new one
we’ll go down to the store right now and we’ll we’ll get you a new chair
but don’t you think rosita would’ve wanted you to move on
i mean y’know she did always put your comfort first
yeah i i don’t want stevie to see her like this
i can’t believe we have to say goodbye to the house we grew up in
man some some stranger’s gonna be living in my room
well after 15 years of mom and dad keeping it as a shrine to you it’s time the velvet ropes came down
they kept your room for a while
dad turned my room into a gym 20 minutes after i moved out
i gotta say a tanning bed and a stack of victoria’s secret catalogues not a gym
come on you know they love you
as much as they love you
well okay it’s already february and i’ve only given two massages and they were both the worst tippers in the world
hey y’know if you want to pick up some extra cash
some friends of mine made good money doing telemarketing
you’re really good on the phone
yeah and yeah and it would probably be better than the last telephone job i had
y’know i probably wouldn’t have to say spank as much
oh yeah like you never called
so basically this is very easy
you read from the script and try to sell as much toner as you possibly can
oh by the way i love my office
why don’t we do a trial run
hi this is phoebe from empire office supplies can i speak to your supply manager please
umm okay i would like to talk to you about your toner needs
oh okay well i’m sorry to bother you
yeah you’re right this is easy
okay what was wrong with that call
oh well all right um no offense but you were kind of rude
they’re always going to tell you they don’t need toner but that’s okay because whatever they say you can find the answer to it here in this script
so i think you’re ready to sell toner do you have any last questions
i do i do have one question
oh no no no no no no
god it seems like just yesterday you guys used to come out to watch me work
dad we we can’t believe you’re selling the house
well it’s time for a new family to start their memories here and hopefully their check will clear before they find the crack in the foundation and the asbestos in the ceiling
let’s grab our stuff and get the hell out of here
i’m sorry we can’t store your childhood things anymore
oh that’s okay i can’t wait to see everything again
well i don’t know what’s in the boxes down here but i do know there are six or seven easy bake ovens in the attic
i used to love to play restaurant
yeah not as much as you used to love to play uncooked batter eater
hey it is unreasonable to expect a child to wait for a light bulb to cook brownies
so i think you’re boxes are over here
wait dad who who’s cigarettes are these
they they must be your mother’s but please please don’t ask her
hey check this out dad math a
oh look look there’s your old makeup kit
well the white seems to be untouched
y’know how the garage floods every spring
how are you ever going to sell this place
i think i accidentally used monica’s boxes to keep the water away from the porsche
you don’t secretly smoke do you
so it’s just your mother then
hi this phoebe from empire office supplies can i speak to your supply manager please
hi earl this is phoebe from empire office supplies i’d like to talk to you about your toner needs
i’m hearing what you’re saying but at our prices everyone needs toner
okay i don’t need any toner because i’m going to kill myself
umm is is that because you’re out of toner
i can’t just let you hang up
well i only have one thing to do today
i guess i could push it back
now why do you want to kill yourself
it’s just that i uh have been working for ten years now at this meaningless dead end job and nobody here even knows i exist
no look i i’m sure that people know you exist
i work in a cubicle surrounded by people
i’ve been talking to you for five minutes now about killing myself and no one’s even looked up from their desk
now if anybody asks your name is rosita
because i know what i like and what i don’t like
well look if you don’t like this
i don’t know why you say that so soon
come on joey i just bought you a new chair
the most expensive one in the store
hey y’know what i was thinking
joey the new chair will be here in an hour
maybe we should actually move rosita out of here
maybe maybe i’ll take her down to the incinerator
it’s gonna be so said and kinda cool
no it’s not weird it’s a miracle
if you want something enough and your heart is pure wondrous things can happen
can you tell me how this happened
maybe somebody came in here and fixed it
that’s right joey the chair angel came in and heeled your chair
get your non believer ass outta my chair
it’s not like i did it on purpose
dad that won’t matter to her
look all my stuff is safe and dry and all her is is is growing new stuff
see this is exactly the kind of thing that makes her think you guys love me more than you love her
oh my god does she really thinks that
well i don’t know i i suppose we may have favored you unconsciously you were a medical marvel
the doctor said your mother could
dad dad i don’t want to hear about it
okay look monica came here for some memories and damnit we’re gonna give her some
okay grab grab some empty boxes
we’ll we’ll take stuff from mine and whatever we can pass off as hers we’ll we’ll put ‘em in their
i am so psyched i kept this chair for myself
hey how’s how’s the uh miracle chair
y’know that this thing has speakers in the headrest
you can hook it up to your tv and you get radio
all i’m saying is that you’re not alone all right
everybody hates the people they work with
that sounded like someone being nice to you
that’s just the hey guy guy
i’d like to take him with me
all right so earl let’s just forget about the people at the office okay
there there’s gotta be someone else in your life worth sticking around for
what about what about your family your friends or maybe your girlfriend
okay i should i should probably be getting back to my thing now
don’t you dare hang up on me
hey i just whipped us up some easy bake treats they should be ready in about three days
oh this will make a great memory
yeah oh you loved that thing
you always had it with you
you never went anywhere without without that coloring book
it looks like i had some trouble staying inside the lines
oh yeah you loved that glove
you took it every place you went
you never went any place without that glove
i can’t believe i even fit into this shirt
oh i don’t know how that got in there
hey this isn’t this isn’t my stuff
well the garage flooded sweetie and it ruined everything in your boxes
so why why wasn’t ross’s stuff ruined
and if you say the words medical marvel i’m going to easy bake your head
well i used your boxes to divert water away from the porsche
so wait ross’s stuff is fine but i have no memories because you wanted to keep the bottom two inches of your car away from water
there was also leaves and guk and stuff
how would you like to sit in a chair that fully reclines has a rolling massage and speakers in the head rest
yeah i’d love to but i’ve tried that so many times they won’t even let me in the store anymore
well what if i told you you can do it in my apartment
are you telling me that you bought the chair that is making all other lounge systems obsolete
the chair that sit magazine called the chair of the year
i just purchased the la z boy e cliner 3000
well it’s a long story but umm i broke joey’s chair
i thought i broke joey’s chair
that’s why i replaced it with mine
well what did you think that that elves came in and fixed it
well it looks like it wasn’t heeled after all
so i guess this chair is mine now
yeah he thought he broke your chair so he switched the chairs
i’m so glad i have the new chair to get my through this difficult time in my life
nice try but you don’t get that chair anymore
you can sit on my lap
i think i should get the chair
because you broke a chair and you broke a chair
the only one around here that hasn’t broke a chair is me
well where’s the logic in that
the logic is that there are two of us and we are both strong enough to break a chair in half
so joey breaks my chair and i get nothing
can you tell me where i can find earl
he’s the supply manager around here
sorry i don’t know any earl
umm look it you you can’t kill yourself
look um i really appreciate your coming down
i can’t let you do it
because it was fate that made me call you today
this isn’t even my regular job
and my first day on the job you’re my first call
and and somebody else might’ve hung up on you but i wouldn’t do that because i know about this stuff
i’m not gonna give you tips
look don’t you see that this this this all came together so that i could stop you from doing this
couldn’t it just be a coincidence
it doesn’t really seem like enough to be fate
well umm okay here’s a weird thing
my mother was also a supply manager
your your name is earl right
her name was pearl p earl
oh i’ve got i’ve got goose bumps
well y’know i’m wearing layers and it’s warm
these jerks might not care about you but the universe does
i don’t need you guys to care about me
i really wished they’d care just a little bit though
y’know i don’t i don’t think it’s you
it obviously meant enough for me to save it and i don’t even know what it is
what do you think this is
i think it was a mouse
how do you think i am
you’ve wrecked all my childhood memories
you love ross more than me
and i just rubbed a dead mouse on my face
sweetheart we love you just as much as ross
now i’m sorry about everything that happened and i’d probably never be able to make it up to you but here’s a start
it’s the key to my porsche
well the key to your porsche
i’ve been thinking about getting rid of it
i was driving it the other day and saw my reflection in a store window
your mother’s right i do look like an ass
wait you’re giving me your porsche you’re kidding me right
well w w w w wait w wait wait wait a minute
i mean a couple of stupid boxes get wet and she gets a porsche
why don’t we take it for a spin
do you guys know what happened to chandler’s barca lounger
had to get rid of it
i get a porsche and the barca lounger’s gone
this is the best day ever
